channel.title: "Error connecting to server" for the past 6 days... help please
channel.description:
Hello, As you can tell I am new to Moparscape but I would really like your help :(
I play this server called "QuarterX" (Please remove the name if it is in anyway advertisement) and It's been working for a REALLY LONG TIME but 6 days ago I have received an error and have been unable to log in :(
When ever I click "Login" it says "Error connecting to server" after a few seconds...
The owner is my personal friend and he said I am not IP-banned...
I know it isn't the server because there are around 150+ people online...
Please help me, I have been searching for help for 6 days :(
Thanks alot and I really appreciate it.
~Arron
